summary-normalize: Standardize script imports and documentation links
dialog-install-warning: All user scripts could contain malicious content capable of compromising your account. Installing a script means it could be changed by others; make sure you trust its author. If you're unsure whether a script is safe, check at the technical village pump.
dialog-capture-name-description: Name displayed in the sidebar for this script
panel-header: Manage JavaScript and CSS loaded with your account
settings-default-tab-description: Which tab to show when the panel opens
settings-capture-enabled-description: Capture script loads and show them in the sidebar
settings-userscript-load-caching-enabled: Enable script load caching via API
Insert/remove code from [[:en:User:SD0001/Making user scripts load faster|userscript load caching via API]] at the top of global.js
gadgets-not-available: No gadgets available or failed to load gadgets data.
notification-general-error: An error occurred. Please try again.
error-cannot-install-skin: This page is one of your user customization pages, and may (will, if common.js) already run on each page load.
error-temp-warning: Installation of non-User, non-MediaWiki protected pages is temporary and may be removed in the future.
error-bad-page: Page is not User: or MediaWiki: and is unprotected
error-load-interface: Failed to load interface. Please refresh the page.
error-bootstrap-failed: Script Manager failed to initialize. Check console for details.
security-warning:
Warning!$1

All user scripts could contain malicious content capable of compromising your account. Installing a script means it could be changed by others; make sure you trust its author. If you're unsure whether a script is safe, check at the technical village pump. Install this script?
tooltip-manage-user-scripts: Manage JavaScript and CSS loaded with your account
